channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: BREAKING: Major earthquake strikes Los Angeles with shaken residents warned to 'prepare for aftershocks'
item.description: Residents in the Los Angeles area have been warned to brace for aftershocks with officials commenting a huge jolt was felt in the major California city this afternoon

item.title: The mystery of bizarre creature that prowled our oceans 500,000,000 years ago
item.description: It has been nicknamed the 'alien fish taco'.

item.title: Mum wrote desperate Facebook post before 'screaming' as son, 2, found dead in canal
item.description: Neighbours have told of their devastation after a two-year-old died after falling into the Wolverhampton canal on Sunday after escaping from his home to "feed the ducks"

item.title: Woman who said her husband chained her to tree for 40 days ‘tied herself up’
item.description: The woman initially claimed her husband had left her in the forest for 40 days.

item.title: Police tackle teen off e-bike and 'kick and punch' him in 'brutal' arrest footage
item.description: Five Greater Manchester Police officers, seen attempting to detain the 16-year-old boy in Stockport in footage, seized a knife and balaclava the youngster "had in his possession"

item.title: Two 12-year-old boys become youngest convicted rioters after 'kicking vape shop window'
item.description: Two 12-year-old boys pleaded guilty to violent disorder in Manchester and Liverpool and are believed to be the youngest people to be convicted over the recent protests

item.title: Child, 8, left with life-changing injuries after being mauled by dog in savage attack
item.description: The eight-year-old child was taken to hospital in Wales with serious injuries after being attacked by the dog - police have arrested a man in connection with the incident
